name: Product Launch Strategy & Execution
description: Complete workflow for planning and executing a successful product launch, from market validation to post-launch analysis

nodes.title: Market Validation Research
nodes.description: Research market demand, validate product-market fit, and gather customer feedback through surveys and market analysis.

nodes.title: Competitive Landscape Analysis
nodes.description: Analyze direct and indirect competitors, identify market positioning opportunities, and define unique value proposition.

nodes.title: Launch Strategy Planning
nodes.description: Develop comprehensive launch strategy including timeline, budget, resources, key milestones, and success metrics.

nodes.title: Marketing Materials Creation
nodes.description: Create all marketing materials including product descriptions, website copy, brochures, and sales presentations.

nodes.title: PR & Media Strategy
nodes.description: Develop press releases, media kits, and PR strategy to generate buzz and media coverage for the product launch.

nodes.title: Digital Marketing Campaign
nodes.description: Plan and create digital marketing campaigns including social media, PPC, email marketing, and influencer partnerships.
nodes.customPrompt: You are a digital marketing specialist with expertise in multi-channel campaigns. Focus on creating cohesive digital strategies that maximize reach and engagement across all digital touchpoints.

nodes.title: Launch Execution Review
nodes.description: Review all launch materials and strategies for consistency, effectiveness, and alignment with business objectives before execution.

nodes.title: Post-Launch Analysis
nodes.description: Analyze launch performance metrics, gather customer feedback, and provide recommendations for optimization and future launches.
